Name: Constance Kurita
Details:
Born 2990.

Daughter of Marcus Kurita, and cousin to the Coordinator, Takashi Kurita, Constance is the current Keeper of the Family Honor, responsible for enforcing the Dictum Honorium and teaching the population of the Draconis Combine the importance of honor. While the position has no formal powers, its role has made it into an important power within House Kurita.
